group_1.textRight: SORRYYY!

group_1.textLeft: It's okay, you don't have to shout!
All the other customers are staring!

group_1.textRight: Uh, ya see...
It totally slipped my mind when I came@in here, but...
Well, you know, my purse? I don't exactly@have it with me!
But! I, um, only really remembered that after@I finished eating...

group_1.textLeft: ...you don't have any money right now?

group_1.textRight: [chara:401101:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Yup...
I was walking around, practically snoring@on my feet, tummy growling...
And then! Oh my gosh! There was this amazing@smell coming outta this place...
Then, ya know, it hit me!
[chara:401101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]The food here must be really good!@
Now that I've tried it, yeah, gotta say,@it's incredible!
That was a top grade hamburg steak.@My knife slid right through it!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, well, I'm very particular about how@I cook it!

group_1.textRight: And the meat juices just gushed out of it!@Juiciest thing I've ever eaten!
The sauce was really good too...
There must be a secret ingredient... Did you@put a dash of coffee in the mix?
It's a known trick of the trade! But, boy,@if it doesn't bring out a deep flavor!
It was an AMAZING steak. I could easily@eat like five at a time a bazillion times!

group_1.textLeft: Gosh...well, I'm delighted to hear that.@I really am...
I mean, I'm very grateful for all your@praise, but...

group_1.textRight: [chara:401101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp* Oh right, that...

group_1.textLeft: Just to be clear... You have no money at@all...?
You can always use our phone to call your@family or a friend to help you...

group_1.textRight: I can't...I can't reach them!
No, it's okay!
Kaoru and Umika will definitely come to@Kamihama.
I just know they will!
